legend.span: 1. Berapa kali Anda pergi untuk perawatan antenatal (kunjungan selama kehamilan) sebelum kelahiran anak ini
1. How many times did you go for antenatal care (visits during pregnancy) before the birth of this child?

Ask the mother to recall the number of times she went for a doctor’s visit/check-up during her pregnancy with this child. If the respondent is not the mother, and does not know the answer, select ‘don’t know’
2. Tempat anak lahir :
2. Place of birth for this child:
Ask the respondent to recall where the child was born
3. Bayi dilahirkan dengan bantuan siapa?
3. Who delivered the baby (highest level provider):
4. Penggunaan kontrasepsi saat ini :
4. Current use of contraceptives:

label.span: Kondom wanita, Diafragma, Foam atau jeli
Female condom, Diaphragm, Foam or jelly

legend.span: 5. Seberapa sering Anda membawa anak (12-23 bulan) ke posyandu
5. How often do you take this child (12-23 month old) to the posyandu

label.span: kurang dari satu kali dalam 6 bulan

legend.span: a. Jika kurang dari satu kali dalam 6 bulan atau tidak pernah, alasan untuk tidak hadir
a. Reason for not attending:

label.span: b. Terakhir kali hadir di posyandu:
b. Last time attended a Posyandu:
Ask the respondent to estimate based on recall, try to get the specific week if exact date is not known

legend.span: c. Layanan yang diterima saat terakhir ke Posyandu :
c. Services received at last Posyandu attended:
6. Jarak ke posyandu terdekat :
6. Distance to the nearest posyandu

label.span: 7. Waktu untuk mencapai posyandu terdekat sekali jalan
7. Time to reach the nearest posyandu one way
8. Biaya untuk mencapai posyandu terdekat dengan angkutan umum
8. Cost to reach the nearest posyandu one way with public transport
Ask the respondent to estimate how long it normally takes them to get to the posyandu (one way), while taking into consideration regular mode of transportation and regular levels of traffic

legend.span: 9. Seberapa sering Anda membawa anak (12-23 bulan) ke Puskesmas
9. How often do you take this child (12-23 month old) to the Puskesmas

label.span: kurang dari satu kali dalam 6 bulan

legend.span: a. Jika kurang dari satu kali dalam 6 bulan atau tidak pernah, alasan untuk tidak hadir
a. Reason for not attending:

label.span: b. Terakhir kali hadir di Puskesmas
b. Last time attended a Puskesmas:

legend.span: c. Layanan yang diterima saat terakhir ke Puskesmas :
c. Services received at last visit to Puskesmas:
10. Jarak ke Puskesmas terdekat :
10. Distance to nearest Puskesmas

label.span: 11. Waktu untuk mencapai Puskesmas terdekat sekali jalan
11. Time to reach the nearest Puskesmas one way
12. Biaya untuk mencapai Puskesmas terdekat dengan angkutan umum
12. Cost to reach the nearest Puskesmas one way with public transport
Ask the respondent to estimate how long it normally takes them to get to the posyandu (one way), while taking into consideration regular mode of transportation and regular levels of traffic

legend.span: 13. Apakah anak pernah sakit dalam 2 minggu terakhir (diare, batuk, demam, dll)
13. Has this child been sick in the past 2 weeks (diarrhea, cough, fever, etc.)?
Ask the respondent to recall if in the past 2 weeks the child had been sick
